steps.2: Whisk-Whisk the egg mixture in the bowl
steps.7: add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the bowl
steps.9: Saute-Saute the onions on medium heat until they are soft and translucent
steps.10: Crack-Crack one egg in the bowl
steps.11: Add-Add 1/8 tsp of turmeric to the pan
steps.13: Cook-Cook covered for 1 minute or until the tomatoes soften
steps.14: mixing-Keep mixing with a spatula for 3 minutes or until the eggs are almost cooked
steps.15: pour-Slowly pour the whisked eggs into the pan
steps.16: Heat-Heat 2 tbsp oil in a heavy-bottomed or nonstick pan on medium heat
steps.17: Garnish-Garnish with 1 tbsp chopped cilantro and serve
steps.20: add-add  1 tbsp milk to the bowl
steps.21: add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the pan
steps.22: add-add chopped onions to the pan
